alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 02 at 4:21AM PST until January 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Gusts up to 75 mph possible along most exposed terrain. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast and North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds expected during the afternoon on Sunday. Winds will be accompanied by heavy rain.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
